[img]http://i.imgur.com/Qf4o6Jd.png[/img]


This is the second mod I have ever created and was inspired by ESO's Dream Strider class build video which can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_QsWdABNfKg Be sure to throw him a sub!

Changelog:

27/04/2016
-Removed Nightmare
-Removed Nightmarish Torment
-Polished the spells to give them their own effects instead of duplicating pre-made spells.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/j4BNKEg.png[/img]


You are the chosen acolyte of Vaermina, she has bestowed the power of the Quagmire upon you, imbued with the power of nightmares and mind bending magic, you stand tall as a Dream Strider, Acolyte of Vaermina, gifted with her very staff, which flows with her Daedric Might. You corrupt  minds and cripple sanity with your immense power. Any fool to stand against you would stand no chance of striking you down. Go forth Dream Strider, Acolyte of Vaermina and cripple the minds of those who stand in your way, in the name of your beloved God Vaermina.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/QnSwh1I.png[/img]


Install with NMM if you have it - much faster!

Manual Installation - 
1. Locate your Skyrim Directory.
2. Open the Data folder.
3. Put the AcolyteOfVaermina file into your Data folder.
4. Open Skyrim and boom!



[img]http://i.imgur.com/bI9f8g4.png[/img]


The mod adds the following in the form of tomes in 'Scarlett Glowing Chest' found in the final chamber of Nightcaller Temple, need to do the quest to gain entry to the final room.


Dreambolt - Single Target Damage
Cripple Mind - AOE Fear and DoT (damage over time) (fairly high magicka cost)
Vaermina's Torment - Staff with Unique Enchant and infinite charges.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/qHzdQJH.png[/img]


Hello everyone, my name is Max, also known as Maxranviir. I am an avid World of Warcraft player and I occasionally stream as well.
I suffer from Asperger's Syndrome which is high functioning autism. Also the culprit behind my creativity.
Skyrim is a really great game and the possibilities that you can create with the Creation Kit and phenomenal.
I have made 3 mods in my life-time 1 which is on the nexus, another for personal use, and this one! (my best work)
I am 15 years old and also love to make things in photoshop, such as these images here!
